name: Dark Home: Observations
description:
Retro inspired first person asymmetric horror game.  Search the Rothsman Estate with friends or alone; but always running from the host.  Use items to defend and heal yourself.    Observations is a lite variation of "Dark Home", but functionally better until I release a much needed update.  
   If you find yourself more interested in Dark Home itself, it was made in tandem with "Dark Home" by Author Sandra Rains DeBusk.
